# Usage

<!-- This is generated by scripts/generate-usage.sh. Don't edit this file directly. -->

```console
$ yodoc help
NAME:
   yodoc - A new cli application

USAGE:
   yodoc [global options] command [command options] 

VERSION:
    ()

COMMANDS:
   version     Show version
   init        Scaffold configuration file
   run         Generate documents
   completion  Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, or fish
   help, h     Shows a list of commands or help for one command

GLOBAL OPTIONS:
   --log-level value         log level [$YODOC_LOG_LEVEL]
   --log-color value         Log color. One of 'auto' (default), 'always', 'never' [$YODOC_LOG_COLOR]
   --config value, -c value  Configuration file path [$YODOC_CONFIG]
   --help, -h                show help
   --version, -v             print the version
```

## yodoc init

```console
$ yodoc help init
NAME:
   yodoc init - Scaffold configuration file

USAGE:
   yodoc init

DESCRIPTION:
   Scaffold configuration file.

   $ yodoc init

   This command generates yodoc.yaml.
   If the file already exists, this command does nothing.


OPTIONS:
   --help, -h  show help
```

## yodoc run

```console
$ yodoc help run
NAME:
   yodoc run - Generate documents

USAGE:
   yodoc run

DESCRIPTION:
   Generate documents.

   $ yodoc run


OPTIONS:
   --help, -h  show help
```

## yodoc completion

```console
$ yodoc help completion
NAME:
   yodoc completion - Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, or fish

USAGE:
   yodoc completion command [command options] 

DESCRIPTION:
   Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, or fish.
   Source the output to enable completion.

   e.g.

   .bash_profile

   source <(yodoc completion bash)

   .zprofile

   source <(yodoc completion zsh)

   fish

   yodoc completion fish > ~/.config/fish/completions/yodoc.fish


```
